modalBody.description: Complete technology stack powering the TULAMIA website.
Production hosting on Strato with Plesk control panel.

sections.title: ğŸŒ Strato Hosting
sections.content: German hosting provider with Plesk control panel for domain management, SSL certificates, and PHP configuration.

sections.title: ğŸ” Security
sections.content: ZeroSSL certificates, HTTP Basic Auth for staging environments, and proper file permissions (Plesk domain user isolation).

sections.title: ğŸš€ Deployment Script
sections.content: One-command deployment via deploy-tulamia-v12-to-strato: Git sync, rsync React bundles, database sync, asset build, cache flush, and verification.

sections.title: ğŸ“ Multi-Environment
sections.content: Development (Docker at tulamia-v12.local), Staging (staging.tulamia.site), and Production (tulamia.site) with proper configuration isolation.

modalBody.description: Interactive React applications integrated into TYPO3.

items.title: Landing Page
items.description: Interactive portfolio showcase with 4x4 grid navigation

items.title: Todo App
items.description: Task management with sorting, filtering, and status tracking

items.title: Life Goals
items.description: Goal tracking with progress visualization and charts

items.title: Sales App
items.description: Sales dashboard with Chart.js data visualization

items.title: Job App
items.description: Job listings with TYPO3 backend API integration

modalBody.description: Custom TYPO3 extensions developed for the TULAMIA project.

items.title: tulamia_site
items.description: Main site extension with templates, TypoScript, and SCSS

items.title: typo3_react_importer
items.description: Scaffolds React apps from GitHub into TYPO3 extensions

items.title: typo3_utilitycommand_cli
items.description: Custom CLI commands for TYPO3 maintenance

sections.title: ğŸ³ Docker Compose
sections.content: Multi-service setup: PHP-FPM app container, Apache web server, MySQL database, and Mailhog for email testing.

sections.title: ğŸ”’ SSL Certificates
sections.content: Local HTTPS via mkcert for trusted development certificates.

sections.title: ğŸ“‚ File Permissions
sections.content: UID 1000 mapping ensures proper file ownership between host and containers.

sections.title: ğŸŒ Local Domains
sections.content: Access via tulamia-v12.local with Traefik reverse proxy.

modalBody.description: RESTful APIs connecting React frontends with TYPO3 backend.

items.title: Job App API
items.description: Fetch job listings from TYPO3 Extbase controller via eID endpoint

items.title: Locale API
items.description: Dynamic JSON locale loading from fileadmin via eID controller

items.title: Sales API
items.description: Sales data endpoints for Chart.js visualization

items.title: Life Goals API
items.description: Goal progress tracking with CRUD operations

items.title: Typography
items.description: System fonts with fallbacks: system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif

items.title: React Inspiration
items.description: Styles inspired by ReactBits and shadcn/ui component libraries

items.title: Responsive
items.description: Mobile-first design with Bootstrap 5 grid system

items.title: Dark Mode
items.description: CSS custom properties for light/dark theme switching

modalBody.summary: The TULAMIA website is a personal technology platform developed using TYPO3 CMS v12 with React applications. It demonstrates modern web development practices including containerization, multi-environment deployment, and comprehensive documentation.
highlights: Full-stack development with PHP, React, and TypeScript

modalBody.description: TYPO3 project file and folder structure.

items.title: Bash/Zsh
items.description: Custom aliases and deploy scripts in .bashrc

items.title: Git + GitLab
items.description: Version control with private package hosting

items.title: AI Assistants
items.description: GPT 4.1, Claude Sonnet 4.5 for code assistance

modalBody.summary: The implementation covers local development setup with Docker, website building with TYPO3 and Grunt, React application integration, and deployment to Strato hosting.
highlights: Docker Compose with 4 services (app, apache, mysql, mail)
Grunt build pipeline for SCSS and JavaScript
React apps built with Vite and integrated via typo3_react_importer
RESTful APIs with TYPO3 Extbase controllers

modalBody.summary: The project achieved a fully functional TYPO3 website with integrated React applications, comprehensive documentation, and automated deployment. Future plans include TYPO3 v13/v14 migration, Elasticsearch integration, and CI/CD pipeline implementation.
highlights: Continuous learning platform with no fixed end date
